project.description: Run job by hand to test a cross repo pushes. Blank pull_id(s) will use master

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Build and install HEAD for the integration tests rm -rf li rhc crankcase
git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git://github.com/openshift/crankcase.git git clone git://github.com/openshift/rhc.git
if [ -n "$LI_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Patching Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/li/pull/$LI_PULL_ID" set -x pushd li set +x SECRET=`cat ~/.config/secret` curl --basic -u "openshift-bot:$SECRET" https://github.com/openshift/li/pull/$LI_PULL_ID.patch | git am set -x popd fi
if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Patching Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/crankcase/pull/$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID" set -x pushd crankcase curl https://github.com/openshift/crankcase/pull/$CRANKCASE_PULL_ID.patch | git am popd fi
if [ -n "$RHC_PULL_ID" ]; then set +x echo "
*****Patching Pull Request: https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID" set -x pushd rhc curl https://github.com/openshift/rhc/pull/$RHC_PULL_ID.patch | git am popd fi
set +x echo "
" set -x
pushd li build/devenv launch test_pull_requests_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier --instance_type m1.large build/devenv sync test_pull_requests_${BUILD_NUMBER} --tag --clean_metadata
# Run the tests build/devenv test test_pull_requests_${BUILD_NUMBER} --terminate popd
RESULT=$?
